title: Feeling Good
lyrics:
Birds flying high 
You know how I feel 
Sun in the sky 
You know how I feel 
Breeze driftin' on by 
You know how I feel 



It's a new dawn 

It's a new day 

It's a new life 

For me 

And I'm feeling good 

I'm feeling good



Fish in the sea 

You know how I feel 

River running free 

You know how I feel 

Blossom on the tree 

You know how I feel 



It's a new dawn 

It's a new day 

It's a new life 

For me 

And I'm feeling good 



Dragonfly out in the sun you know what I mean, don't you know 

Butterflies all havin' fun you know what I mean 

Sleep in peace when the day is done that's what I mean

And this old world is a new world 

And a bold world 

For me 

For me



Stars when you shine 

You know how I feel 

Scent of the pine 

You know how I feel 

Oooh freedom is mine 

And I know how I feel 



It's a new dawn 

It's a new day 

It's a new life

It's a new dawn 

It's a new day 

It's a new life 

It's a new dawn 

It's a new day 

It's a new life

It's a new life

For me 



And 

I'm feeling good 

I'm feeling good 

I'm feeling good
